  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:oai.cnice.mec.es:bioo_es_20070518_2_0030614</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ISFRRP-MEPSYD</catalog>
            <entry>bioo_es_20070518_2_0030614</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="es">El Sol</string>
            <string language="en">The sun</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Die Sonne</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Le soleil</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">O sol</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Il sole</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ο ήλιος</string>
          </title>
          <language>es</language>
          <description>
            <string language="es">Se explica el origen de la energía que proviene del Sol, fusión termonuclear, y las radiaciones que emite. Estas radiaciones llegan a La Tierra donde son, en parte, absorbidas por la Atmósfera.</string>
            <string language="en">Topic explaining the origin of the energy which comes from the sun, thermonuclear fusion and the radiation it emits. This radiation reaches the earth where it is absorbed, in part, by the atmosphere.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">geología</string>
            <string language="en">geology</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">biosfera</string>
            <string language="en">biosphere</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">Sol</string>
            <string language="en">Sun</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <value>collection</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Das Thema, das den Ursprung der Energie erklärt, 
die von der Sonne, vom thermonuklearen Schmelzverfahren und von der 
Strahlung es kommt, strahlt aus. Diese Strahlung erreicht die 
Masse, in der sie, im Teil, durch die Atmosphäre aufgesogen wird.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Le sujet expliquant l'origine de l'énergie qui 
vient du soleil, de la fusion thermonucléaire et du rayonnement il 
émet. Ce rayonnement atteint la terre où il est absorbé, en 
partie, par l'atmosphère.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">O tópico que explica a origem da energia que vem 
do sol, da fusão thermonuclear e da radiação ele emite-se. 
Esta radiação alcança a terra onde é absorvida, na parte, 
pela atmosfera.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Il soggetto che spiega l'origine dell'energia che 
viene dal sole, dalla fusione termonucleare e dalla radiazione esso 
emette. Questa radiazione raggiunge la terra in cui è 
assorbita, in parte, dall'atmosfera.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Θέμα που εξηγεί την προέλευση της ενέργειας που 
προέρχεται από τον ήλιο, τη θερμοπυρηνική τήξη και την 
ακτινοβολία που εκπέμπει. Αυτή η ακτινοβολία φθάνει στη γη 
όπου απορροφάται, εν μέρει, από την ατμόσφαιρα.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Geologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Biosphäre</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Sonne</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">géologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">biosphère</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Le soleil</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">geologia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">biosphere</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Sol</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">geologia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">biosfera</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Sole</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">γεωλογία</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">βιόσφαιρα</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ήλιος</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
